# GeoJsonLoader { #brdr.loader.GeoJsonLoader }

```python
loader.GeoJsonLoader(
    id_property=None,
    _input=None,
    source=None,
    source_url=None,
    is_reference=False,
)
```

Base class for loaders dealing with GeoJSON-formatted data.

Processes a GeoJSON FeatureCollection into the internal dictionary format.

## Methods

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [load_data](#brdr.loader.GeoJsonLoader.load_data) | Parses the GeoJSON input and returns the feature collection. |

### load_data { #brdr.loader.GeoJsonLoader.load_data }

```python
loader.GeoJsonLoader.load_data()
```

Parses the GeoJSON input and returns the feature collection.
